overview:
A technology-savvy lady who is as at home amongst the money and strategy discussions planning for the organisation’s future as she is at the software codeface making it all happen.

Alongside being Managing Consultant of The Creative Organisation Alison Wheeler is an active supporter and developer of Open Source / FLOSS / Open Knowledge projects, including Wikipedia where she was Executive Director of the UK Chapter for three years. Other positions have included Global internet & e-commerce Program Manager for a Fortune #300 world-wide distributor, Head of Technology at Capital Radio Interactive, and CTO for a number of start-ups. In UX, she specialises in the demands placed on system development by product globalisation and localisation.

At present AlisonW is working on a bootstrapped start-up to make bookmarks work more effectively on touchscreen interfaces, such as her HP TouchPad tablet, called TouchMark.it

A fan of the Boston Red Sox for many years, watching most of their games live via the internet, she splits her time between a London base near Hampstead Heath and a home in the country near Whipsnade Zoo. She likes travel.

degrees.subject: Strategy; Financial Strategy; Marketing; & Creativity, Innovation and Change
